title: How to install

author: Justin Sargood
comment: For what it's worth, I like that I have to use a pin after locking the device from my watch.   Could be handy in situations where maybe you could possibly be forced to provide a fingerprint.

author: Robby Ticknor
comment: Works exactly as described. I like how it disables the fingerprint and forces the lock pattern to be used. You can be compelled to give a finger print, but not your pattern or password. Good piece of mind just in case.
Perfect! Honor 8 & LG Watch Urbane works flawlessly. As others have stated, very good that the app forces the use of password/pattern to unlock when phone is locked with the app.

comment: It.s a great app but there is a problem ...the app doesn.t appears on my watch ...it.s useless unless you fix this

comment: I was looking for something just like this. Thanks!

reply.author: AXIIIM
reply.content: You're welcome - Thank you for using it!

title: Exactly what I needed!

author: Shreyas M
comment: Its work s for moto g4 but after locking the phone by the wear when i puy my finger on the sensor of my phone the phone doesn't unlock

reply.author: AXIIIM
reply.content: Thank you for leaving a review! Unfortunately, Android disables fingerprint unlock and Smart Lock if it is locked by an application. This means that you won't be able to unlock with your fingerprint after locking with our app. This isn't an issue with the app, rather it is a limitation of the Android system. Sorry :)

author: Rishabh Malhotra
comment: Can't use fingerprint to unlock screen for some strange reason

author: sandeep kapoor
comment: I need the app for my s3 gear watch

reply.author: AXIIIM
reply.content: Unfortunately, Wear Phone Lock isn't compatible with the Gear S3, as it isn't an Android Wear device.
